Name: tgrelid
Description: the table this trigger is on

Name: tgname
Description: trigger name (must be unique among triggers of same table)

Name: tgenabled
Description: true if trigger is enabled (not presently checked everywhere it should be, so disabling a trigger by setting this false does not work reliably)

Name: tgisconstraint
Description: true if trigger implements an ri constraint

Name: tgconstrrelid
Description: the table referenced by an ri constraint

Name: tgnargs
Description: number of argument strings passed to trigger function

Name: tgargs
Description: argument strings to pass to trigger, each null-terminated
